name: ListGithubMilestones
description:
Retrieve milestones from a GitHub repository.

Use this tool to list all milestones for a specified GitHub repository. Ideal for managing project timelines and tracking progress.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the GitHub repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository. This is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: milestone_state
parameters.description: Denotes the state of milestones to fetch: 'open', 'closed', or 'all'.

value_schema.description: The state of the milestone. Either `open`, `closed`, or `all`.

parameters.name: sort_milestones
parameters.description: Criteria to sort milestones by. Options include `due_on` for due date or `completeness` for progress.

value_schema.description: What to sort results by. Either `due_on` or `completeness`.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: The direction for sorting milestones: 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending order.

value_schema.description: The direction of the sort. Either `asc` or `desc`.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of results to display per page (maximum 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: results_page_number
parameters.description: The page number of milestones results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
